review: The apps suck! I can't get the dish anywhere app so I can stream my dvr recordings and I can't get the mgo app so I can see my digital movies purchases. I use can use my chrome stick to do Netflix and hulu. Don't waste you're money if you're looking for media streaming. You're better off with an android box which is only a few dollars more.

review: Disappointed in the Stick. Have excellent signal but system is constantly buffering. Question whether Amazon has the server capacity to support the downloads. I would not recommend the stick. Going to try the Box

review: I really don't think I could live without. My husband and I enjoy it almost every dad. And when my grandchildren come over it is a hit.
